name: Take Me Home (itch)
description:
this is a short RPG Maker game. i had a vague idea in my head, and wanted to make something fast & loose! it's sort of uncomfortable, and anticlimactic. it takes place in a sort of dreamlike limbo, in between death and life. i'm hoping to revisit this universe for more short stories.

it seems kind of incomplete, but i feel like i learned a few things while making it. it's also supposed to end on an uneasy note, so it's "incomplete" in that way.
